sn46.51:2.1: 6. Sākacchavagga
sn46.51:4.2: “Pañcannañca, bhikkhave, nīvaraṇānaṃ sattannañca bojjhaṅgānaṃ āhārañca anāhārañca desessāmi;
sn46.51:4.4: Ko ca, bhikkhave, āhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya?
sn46.51:4.7: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā kāmacchandassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.

sn46.51:6.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, arati tandi vijambhitā bhattasammado cetaso ca līnattaṃ.
sn46.51:6.4: ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā thinamiddhassa uppādāya, uppannassa vā thinamiddhassa bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya.
